name: DGCP™ — Official Protocol Identity Cover (2025 Edition)
description:
DGCP™ — Duck Governance & Continuous Proof™
is the world’s first real-life data protocol born directly from
a survival event inside MaMeeFarm™.

Not theory.
Not simulation.
Not AI fabrications.
This protocol emerged because real animals lived, vanished, suffered,
and survived — and their evidence demanded a system that could not lie.

This cover represents the identity of DGCP™
and the moment when real life became structured, timestamped,
cross-verified, and permanently anchored into multi-layer proofs.

Append-only.
Reality-first.
Ethically governed.
Protected under MMFARM-POL-2025 (Proof-of-Life License).

This is not merely an image.
It is the emblem of a protocol that cannot be faked.
